thread.title: Squaw Valley writers event highlights annual Litquake festival
thread.title_full: Squaw Valley writers event highlights annual Litquake festival - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Eli Wolfe
title: Squaw Valley writers event highlights annual Litquake festival
text:
Photo: Shelley Eades A scene from the 2014 Litquake. This year's event is around the corner, and in addition to the usual readings and panels, this year’s festival is breaking new ground with events featuring political satire and food writing. The Bay Area’s premiere literary festival runs from Oct. 9 to 17. A scene from the 2014 Litquake. This year's event is around the...
San Francisco may be in a drought, but at least its residents will never thirst for literature. A scene from the 2014 Litquake. This year's event is around the corner, and in addition to the usual readings and panels, this year’s festival is breaking new ground with events featuring political satire and food writing.
